data.title: Home page
data.meta_description: From planning to execution, get resources or real-time assistance for every stage of your business. SCORE has a library of useful documents and online courses, as well as experienced mentors to help you with your business journey.
data.text:
Small Business Success Starts Here

SCORE can help you start, grow or successfully exit a business. Small business owners who receive three or more hours of mentoring report higher revenues and increased growth. Enter your ZIP code to find a free SCORE business mentor today.

Zipcode

Featured Success Story

A Sweet Success

Tonyia Smith of Silver Slice Bakery has transformed her lifelong passion for baking into a thriving business. Starting from her home kitchen, Tonyia's dedication to high-quality, gluten-free treats has won the hearts of many. Through SCORE mentorship, she navigated financial planning and expanded her operations. Discover how Tonyia's commitment to delicious, health-conscious baking has built a loyal customer base and set a new standard in the gluten-free baking industry.

Disaster Recovery and Preparation Resources

Navigating Business Challenges with SCORE

At SCORE, we understand the severe challenges that disasters, economic downturns and catastrophic events can impose on your business.

SCORE offers comprehensive checklists to prepare you for various weather-related events, including tornadoes, hurricanes, winter weather and earthquakes.

Additionally, you can connect with SCORE mentors who can assist you in creating a robust emergency or recovery plan, ensuring your business is well-prepared for any future challenges.

Visit the Disaster Preparedness and Recovery Resource Hub

Workshops and Events

The Startup Roadmap: Your Guide to Successfully Starting a Business

SCORE offers free online learning: Our self-paced learning provides an opportunity for you to learn valuable business skills.

Learn More

Getting Started with

E-commerce

The Getting Started with Small Business eCommerce learning course guides your journey from brick and mortar to click and order.

Learn More

Simple Steps for Starting Your Business: Startup Basics

If you’re thinking about starting your own business, this module will teach you the basics. You will learn whether business ownership is right for you.

View Course

Online Marketing for Small Business Owners

How to brand your business, top tips for choosing the right domain name, best practices for building your website and ways to leverage social media for growth.

Learn More

Simple Steps for Starting Your Business: Marketing Plan

In this module, you’ll learn how to market your business by doing a competitive analysis, identifying target markets, outlining a marketing message and more.

View Course

Simple Steps for Starting Your Business: Financial Projections

In this online module, you'll learn the importance of financial planning, how to build your financial model, how to understand financial statements and more.

View Module

The Startup Roadmap: Marketing Your Business

Learn about how SCORE's Startup Roadmap details how to market your business, find your first customers, and how serves a need they have.

View Module

The Startup Roadmap: Accounting, Insurance, and Legal Considerations

In this module of the SCORE Startup Roadmap, you’ll establish your administrative and operational structure and processes to helps ensure that your startup runs effectively and efficiently.

View Module

Upcoming Events

Marketing on a Budget: Boost Your Brand Without Breaking the Bank

Don’t empty your pockets to market your business. Join this webinar to learn cost-effective strategies to maximize your marketing impact and grow your business.

How to Optimize Your Google Business Profile to Boost Your Online Presence

Learn how your business can appear on Google Search and Maps leveraging Google My Business, now known as Google Business Profile.

How to Write a One-Page Business Plan: A Step-by-Step Guide

In this webinar, you will learn how to write a one-page business plan. You'll see the elements of the one-page business plan, including identifying the problem your business solves, your value proposition, your target audience and much more.

Use These Free Templates & Resources to Reach Your Business Goals

Leverage these free templates and resources to propel your business toward success, while complementing your journey with the guidance of a SCORE Mentor, ensuring a well-rounded strategy for achieving your business goals. With the right tools and expert guidance, your business can thrive and reach new heights.

Fundamentals of Financial Literacy for Black-Owned Businesses

Financial literacy is the key that unlocks the door to economic empowerment and generational wealth.

As a black-owned business, it is crucial to equip yourself with the financial literacy and expertise needed to overcome systemic barriers, seize opportunities and build a thriving business.

Optimizing financial literacy empowers black-owned businesses, leading to increased financial stability, access to capital, wealth creation and resilience in the face of challenges.

Supplier Diversity: Understanding Minority Business Enterprise and Disadvantaged Business Certifications

The Supplier Diversity & Certifications course modules will familiarize and prepare you for pursuing new opportunities and growing your business.

SCORE for All

SCORE for All is the bridge that makes the journey to success more direct and sure-footed for entrepreneurs who need more support.

7 Ways to Support Black-Owned Businesses

Explore effective strategies for supporting Black-owned businesses, including increasing visibility, direct engagement, partnerships and advocacy for equity to foster innovation and diversity in the business world.

12 Funding Options for Black-Owned Businesses

To help Black-owned businesses identify the best funding sources available, we asked CEOs and business leaders this question for their best insights. From the iFundWomen of Color Program to Reign Ventures, there are several options available particularly for Black business owners to secure funding for their businesses.

The Startup Roadmap: Your Guide to Successfully Starting a Business

The Startup Roadmap outlines each step in starting a business with detailed information and resources. And with SCORE, you don’t have to do it alone.

10 Ways To Celebrate National Black Business Month

To help you best support Black-owned businesses, we asked Black business owners and leaders this question for their best recommendations. From promoting Black-owned businesses on social media to providing Black founders with more access to funding, several recommendations may help you offer the best support to Black-owned businesses as you celebrate National Black Business Month.

13 Black Business Owners Share Their Secrets To Success

Get tips from Black entrepreneurs on how to succeed in business.

7 Ways to Be an Ally for Black Business Owners

Learn how you can best be an ally to Black business owners.

Business Planning & Financial Statements Template Gallery

Download our easy-to-use business planning, finance, sales, marketing, and management templates to help you plan for a new business or grow your existing business.

60th Anniversary Pitch Competition

Are you ready to take your product or service to the next level?

This summer, be a part of SCORE's 60th Anniversary Pitch Competition and pitch your business to a panel of industry experts. Compete for a chance to win up to $20,000 for your business and receive invaluable mentorship and exposure along the way.

Don’t miss this opportunity to showcase your innovation and secure the support you need to succeed!

Learn more about the Pitch Competition

Empowering Black Entrepreneurs

Black Entrepreneurs are driving transformative change in their communities, tackling unique challenges and seizing opportunities with tenacity and vision. These pioneering individuals foster economic growth, create vital jobs, and leverage innovative solutions to meet community needs. With a deep commitment to their cultural heritage and local environments, Black-owned businesses are building vibrant, resilient economies and showcasing exceptional capacity for innovation and sustainability.

View Resources for Black Entrepreneurs

Get Business Advice Now. Chat Live With a Mentor.

Have a quick business question and need it right away? You can use our online chat to connect 1:1 with a mentor. Simply click on the chat bubble that appears on the bottom of every page. Chat mentors are available:

Mondays - Thursdays, 9 am - 5 pm ET.

Chat Now

Featured Chat Mentor

John Fisher, SCORE Business Mentor

“I’ve been a SCORE mentor for eight years and have always enjoyed talking with business owners and aspiring entrepreneurs about ways to help their businesses grow, or their ideas grow into a business. Recently, I have become one of the mentors who responds to chat requests. We are a small, dedicated team of experienced mentors who answer questions from those visiting our site. It is very interesting to hear the questions and challenges facing our clients across the country, and it’s rewarding to provide them with immediate answers and ideas. In addition, I've become a better mentor as a result of chatting with people at different stages in their business.” -John Fisher

Browse Mentor Profiles
